description: VReS (Virtual Reality Electronic Sports) are tokens for VR video games and eSports that will be issued on the Ethereum platform. Using VReS tokens, players will be able to participate in eSports competitions, receive remuneration, and receive tips. Furthermore,viewers will be able to not only watch matches but also place bets on certain matches,and this will create economic incentives for players. A new ecosystem will be created based on this going forward.
name: Virtual Reality Electronic Sports
